Controls.Recommendation: There are 2 steps involved. You need to clean up unexpected 'Classic Administrators'. Steps to clean up classic administrators: Go to https://manage.windowsazure.com/ --> settings tab -> administrators --> select and remove unwanted administrators using remove icon on the bottom ribbon .
Controls.Rationale: Each additional person in the Owner/Contributor role increases the attack surface for the entire subscription. The number of members in    these roles should be kept to as low as possible.
